name: Lone Lunes
description:
Help all the lonely moons find a companion! 🌚💕🌝

Push moons together! 🌚➡️⬅️🌝

Collect stars to power-up and push heavier moons ⭐️💪🌎

Whack your pesky moon into others to release stars  🌑💥🌝⭐️

W⬆️A⬅️S⬇️D➡️ to move

Press R to restart ↩️

This game was created for the GM48 game jam.

-

Tools:
Code - Make in GameMaker Studio 2

Art - Adobe Illustrator

Music - Bosca Ceoil

SFX - Bfxr & Original recording 🎙😮

If you're in a hurry - there's a cheat where you can give yourself loads of star power by mashing the up arrow key a bunch.

Psst - try playing on poly mode by pressing P during the game
